name: r6stats
description: Always stay connected to Rainbow Six Siege with the r6stats app. It has all the features you need to stay on top of your stats, view friends stats, view casual, ranked, weapon, and overall stats, and see how youre doing in the leaderboard. r6stats includes several features that the official Rainbow Six website does not display or any other stat tracking site. In a game such as Rainbow Six siege, where competition is everything, being able to track your stats and daily progression is of the utmost important. The trademarks Rainbow Six, the Soldier Icon, Uplay, & the Uplay logo are owned by Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries
